Title: Expands the offense of assault in the second degree to include the causing of injury to a frontline employee enforcing a rule or regulation related to controlling the spread of communicable diseases
Summary: Expands the offense of assault in the second degree to include the causing of injury to a frontline employee enforcing a city or state rule or regulation related to controlling the spread of communicable diseases.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to expanding the offense of assault in the second degree to include the causing of injury to a frontline employee enforcing a city or state rule or regulation related to controlling the spread of communicable diseases
